name: Convenience Store Simulator (mineralsoda, Subversive Salmon)
description:
convenience stores are often chill, relaxed places. -- NOT THIS ONE! 

at this convenience store, robbers are almost constantly trying to rob you and do all sorts of stuff. oh noes!

convenience store simulator is a exhilarating recreation of the thrilling retail working experience!

  • full no-strings attached retail experience
  • EXPERIENCE A ROBBERY IN REAL TIME?!?!
  • DEFEND YOURSELF WITH A HIGH CALIBER SNIPER RIFLE?!?!?
  •  get paid
  •  walk around a spacious convenience store and avoid deadly traps explosions, 
  • LOTS of explosions...
  •  Meet unique customers and hear their one-of-a-kind dialogue!

Intruders come in all shapes and sizes, and they'll enter your convenience store in any way they can! this means they can drill through the wall, dig a hole through the ground, or enter through the front door like a ruthless savage and act out their criminal antics!


intruders drilling through the walls can be heard by the faint sound of their drill, and those of them that dwell underground make a hole before they burst through the ground and start exploding the store.

you got the strap though sheesh

this game was made in seven days for the brackeys 2021.2 game jam by tasteless tomatos and mineralsoda
